subject: National Invitation Tournament
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: After replacing disappointment with motivation and focus, the Nittany Lions will face Baylor in a game that could be their first title in 10 N.I.T. appearances.
snippet: After replacing disappointment with motivation and focus, the Nittany Lions will face Baylor in a game that could be their first title in 10 N.I.T. appearances.
